root_cause: Uninitialized variables and deprecated function usage
suggested_fix: Remove unused variables and initialize all local variables with appropriate values; replace 'legacyInit()' with the modern equivalent from init_system.
error_signature: gcc -Wall -Wextra -c main.c | main.c:6:9: warning: unused variable 'count' [-Wunused-variable] |     6 |     int count = 42; // unused variable warning
